Description: Fragment of lower body and small flaring foot of East Greek, possibly North Ionian, pottery bowl or cup; interior: reserved band on mid-wall; tondo glazed with two added red rings; exterior: reserved with wide streaky black band above foot join; outside of foot glazed, underside reserved; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 713, no. 716)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.256)
